companyDescriptions.c0: Integrator company developing B2B solutions for large commercial enterprises.
companyDescriptions.c1: Digital studio, one of the main clients is the automobile manufacturer LADA (AvtoVAZ).
companyDescriptions.c2: International optics manufacturer (operates in 92 countries), listed in the top 500 US internet retailers.
companyDescriptions.c3: One of the largest and oldest real estate development and construction companies in the Russian market.

projectDescriptions.p1: A large portal similar to a CRM for car dealers, suppliers, and AvtoVAZ contractors.
projectDescriptions.p2: A platform with analytics for senior managers and the CEO of AvtoVAZ.
projectDescriptions.p3: International online store with complex architecture and high daily traffic (132,000 unique users/day).
projectDescriptions.p4: Mobile version of the Glasses Store Desktop with equally high load and complexity.
projectDescriptions.p5: Federal platform for developers, suppliers, designers, architects, builders, and more.
projectDescriptions.p6: Cross-browser VPN extension with over 6M users in the Chrome Web Store.
projectDescriptions.p7: Cross‑platform desktop VPN application built on Electron and React.

ownProjectDescriptions.op1: Browser extension to manage application submissions with window tracking and auto‑fill.
ownProjectDescriptions.op2: Telegram bot to manage extension subscriptions, including key generation and payments.
ownProjectDescriptions.op3: A project that visualizes your whole life by weeks.

educationData.university: Volga Region State University of Service
educationData.thesis: Methods for reducing nonlinear distortions in the audio frequency path
